name.baseName: Lead-zinc ore ; Lead-zinc ore ; Surface mining ; All sizes; NESPS2
铅锌矿石 ; 铅锌矿 ; 露采工艺 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)is/

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)is/
technology.technologicalApplicability: 此工业过程包括铅锌矿石的露天采矿，适用于所有规模的开采作业。所提到的末端污染管理技术专为露天采矿活动设计。这些技术包括降水分离和化学沉淀方法，旨在控制和减少采矿作业中的颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）、废水污染物、化学需氧量、氨氮、总磷、有机结合氮以及铅、镉、砷和汞等有毒金属。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码09,四级代码0912文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution MercuryisChemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标汞的末端治理技术是化学沉淀，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=废水处理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/企业正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为汞，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为汞

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)is/.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 参见无组织排放核算公式本手册第3.5节。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 参见无组织排放核算公式本手册第3.5节. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物原文描述的产污系数为 参见无组织排放核算公式本手册第3.5节。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
